name: In re Dawn A. SEGAL, Municipal Court Judge, First Judicial District Philadelphia County. Petition of Dawn A. Segal

judges: Justice EAKTN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: In re Dawn A. SEGAL, Municipal Court Judge, First Judicial District Philadelphia County. Petition of Dawn A. Segal.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of January, 2016, the Petition for the Allowance of a Subpoena Pursuant to Pa.R.J.A. 1701 is GRANTED.
Justice EAKTN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
130 A.3d 1281
In re Dawn A. SEGAL, Municipal Court Judge, First Judicial District Philadelphia County. Petition of Dawn A. Segal.
No. 158 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 22, 2016.
